meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Katie Pieper Jason George Pam Platt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7341.

td.p: Katie Pieper, a Ph.D. student from Athens, Georgia
Jason George, a management consultant originally from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Pam Platt, a writer and editor from Louisville, Kentucky (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,600)

tr.td: SIGNATURES
LIT-POURRI
BORN IN CONNECTICUT
RED RHYME
(Alex: Each correct response will rhyme with the word "red".)
ROCKS
ROLES

Jason

THAT'S B_S!
